greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of tangent of 75 degrees.
comment: An equivalent definition of this sequence: decimal expansion of x > 1 satisfying x^2 - 4*x + 1 = 0. - _Arkadiusz Wesolowski_, Nov 28 2011
An algebraic integer of degree 2 with minimal polynomial x^2 - 4*x + 1. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 17 2016
Length of the second longest diagonal in a regular 12-gon with unit side. - _Mohammed Yaseen_, Dec 13 2020
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (terms 1..1000 from Ivan Panchenko)
formula: Equals 2 + sqrt(3) = cotangent of 15 degrees. - _Rick L. Shepherd_, Jul 04 2004
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
